resources.string: Goal: Privacy friendly WiFi keeps track of the CellIDs in your areay while you are in a Wifi. By keeping this information, the app tries to learn where your WiFi is located without using GPS. The main goal is to save battery life by automatically disabling your phones Wifi when it is not near a already known and used wireless network.
Privacy: This privacy friendly app preserves your privacy by tracking least necessary data. All data is kept on your phone. No data is send to anybody. We also try to use least permissions possible.
Author: Jan Henzel, Patrick Jauernig, Dennis Werner
This application belongs to the Privacy Friendly Apps Project.
More information can be found at:
